title: Riot fix your end of game grading system.
body: Please tell me how going 8/1/1 as mid lane singed {{champion:27}} with the most damage not give me an S or at least an S-. I mean, i made the lvl6 zed go 0/7/0 for damn sake.i have been trying for so long to get an S on singed but i seems to be the hardest thing to do in all of league.

replies.body: Your CS is pathetic for a singed.
Obviously CS, you would need at least ~150.

bc bad cs, i couldn't find the game in your match history so i cant comment on your ward placement etc., also, no one on your team really has great kill participation or anything like that. also, singeds are supposed to proxy and feed only{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} , so u fked up there

> [{quoted}](name=Gu5t4v0 M3x1c4n0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eAVPln8m,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-29T08:18:09.771+0000)
>
> i have been trying for so long to get an S on singed but i seems to be the hardest thing to do in all of league.

Ever tried Singed Support? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I have actually i finally got my 2nd S from it.
Hasn't this old dog been beaten enough.....

Yeah i get that my cs was kinda bad for a 20 min game but the ww got one even though he did worse in basically every aspect.
Plus the average for singed should be low as most players feed.

> [{quoted}](name=Gu5t4v0 M3x1c4n0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eAVPln8m,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-29T10:34:15.827+0000)
>
> Yeah i get that my cs was kinda bad for a 20 min game but the ww got one even though he did worse in basically every aspect.
> Plus the average for singed should be low as most players feed.

Warwick got great CS since he was jungling, and no one ended his streak. He also got nearly the same kill participation as you. So...
